statements: SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, volume FROM stock_market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, high_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price, low_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT stock_symbol, high_price, low_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE close_price > open_price ORDER BY high_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_market_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY avg_close_price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price, volume FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT date, close_price, open_price, volume, stock_symbol FROM stock_data WHERE close_price > 100
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND volume > 100000
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY close_price DESC
SELECT trend_id, stock_symbol, trend_type, start_date FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Upward'
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, date FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_data GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, trend_type, start_date, end_date FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_type = 'bullish' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, trend_type, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM stock_trends GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT symbol, open_price, volume FROM stock_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY open_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND trend_description LIKE '%upward%';
SELECT symbol, action, amount FROM investment_decisions WHERE action = 'BUY';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, close_price, volume FROM stock_data WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price DESC, volume ASC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(close_price) AS max_close_price, MIN(close_price) AS min_close_price FROM stock_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, trend_description FROM stock_trends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 20;
SELECT symbol, action, amount FROM investment_decisions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockData LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM StockData ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_volume FROM StockData WHERE stock_volume > 10000;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_price FROM StockData WHERE stock_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM StockData WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_name DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM StockData WHERE stock_volume > 1000 ORDER BY stock_price ASC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_volume, stock_price FROM StockData WHERE stock_price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY stock_volume DESC;

SELECT StockData.stock_name, StockHistory.date, StockHistory.close_price FROM StockData INNER JOIN StockHistory ON StockData.stock_id = StockHistory.stock_id WHERE StockHistory.close_price > StockHistory.open_price ORDER BY StockHistory.date;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 100 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT trend_type, start_date, end_date FROM stock_trends ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_specialization FROM stock_analysts WHERE analyst_specialization = 'Technical Analysis';
SELECT transaction_type, quantity, price, date FROM stock_transactions WHERE stock_id = 3 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, trend_type FROM stock_trends WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT sa.analyst_name, sa.analyst_specialization, st.conclusion FROM stock_analysis sa JOIN stock_trends st ON sa.trend_id = st.trend_id WHERE sa.conclusion LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY st.end_date DESC;

SELECT sa.analyst_name, st.trend_type, sp.price FROM stock_analysis sa JOIN stock_trends st ON sa.trend_id = st.trend_id JOIN stock_prices sp ON st.stock_id = sp.stock_id WHERE sp.price > 50 ORDER BY sp.price ASC;
